scenes.text_segment:
Jetsun paced down the hallway, trying to stay ahead of the screams.

The high ceilings of the Western Air Temple tended to make echoes of

whispers and explosions of dropped teacups. Though the girl was back in

the infirmary being watched by the elders, her cries of pain sprang from

every surface, bouncing off the hard stone.
scenes.visual_prompt: Wide shot of an ancient temple hallway, high ceilings with intricate carvings, dimly lit with flickering torchlight casting long shadows. The atmosphere is tense with an echoing soundscape, as if screams are reverberating off the stone walls. The camera slowly tracks along the hallway, capturing the sense of urgency and foreboding.

audio_cues.description: faint, haunting screams reverberating through the hallway
quick, echoing footsteps on stone floor

scenes.text_segment:
Jetsun couldn’t take it anymore and broke into a full run. Ignoring

decorum, she sped past her sisters, ruffling robes, upsetting inkpots,

prematurely ruining colorful sand paintings that were meant to be ruined

only once they were finished. No one scolded her or gave her sharp looks in

passing. They understood.
scenes.visual_prompt: Dynamic shot of Jetsun running through a corridor, her robes billowing behind her, sand paintings scattering in a flurry of colors. The camera uses a handheld style to convey urgency, focusing on the motion blur of her rapid movement. The lighting is soft but chaotic, capturing the disruption she leaves in her wake.

audio_cues.description: sound of robes flapping as Jetsun runs

scenes.text_segment:
When she ran out of floor, she jumped. The upside-down construction

of the temple meant that despite its overall size, there was very little space

to stand on, nothing connecting the spires but thin air and a three-thousandfoot drop. She didn’t have her glider. Eminently dangerous, but she could

make the leap without it.

Air at her back and air against her robes gave her enough loft to land on

the next tower, the one containing the Great Library.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the temple's architecture, showcasing its upside-down construction with spires and vast empty spaces. Jetsun is captured mid-leap, her robes fluttering as she defies gravity. The camera follows her trajectory in slow motion, highlighting the vast drop below and the daring nature of her jump. The lighting is dramatic, with a sunset glow illuminating her path.

audio_cues.description: powerful gusts of wind as Jetsun leaps
gentle thud as she lands on the next tower

scenes.text_segment:
Tsering, chief

caretaker of the books, waited in front of the tall shelves. The older

woman’s kind eyes were edged with worry. “I saw you coming. Is it

happening again?”

Jetsun nodded. “Mesose,” she said.

Tsering blew out a breath, a silent whistle of frustration. “That could be

Mesose, famous scholar of the Ru Ming era. There’s a Mesose village in Hu

Xin; it might have been named after a founder. Or it could just be someone

called Mesose, in which case we’re stuck.”
scenes.visual_prompt: Medium shot in the Great Library, Tsering stands in front of towering bookshelves filled with ancient scrolls and tomes. The lighting is soft and ambient, casting gentle shadows across the room. The camera focuses on Tsering's face, capturing the concern and wisdom in her eyes as she converses with Jetsun.

audio_cues.description: soft rustling of pages and distant murmurs

scenes.text_segment:
They split up to search different sections of the ancient vault. Jetsun ran

her eyes over labels and titles as fast as she could. Not every book fit on a

shelf. Many of the tomes kept at the Western Temple were so old they were

written on bamboo slips instead of paper. She passed rolled bales of text

wider around than some of the pillars connecting the ceilings to the floors.
scenes.visual_prompt: Tracking shot following Jetsun as she navigates the labyrinthine aisles of the library. The camera pans across rows of ancient bamboo texts and scrolls, capturing the texture and age of the materials. The lighting is dim, with focused beams highlighting Jetsun's path and the intricate details of the texts.

audio_cues.description: gentle rustling of paper and bamboo as Jetsun searches
the soft sound of a scroll being unrolled
